yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā tuqaddimū bayna yadayi al-lahi warasūlihi wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha samīʿun ʿalīmun
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā tarfaʿū aṣwātakum fawqa ṣawti al-nabiyi walā tajharū lahu bil-qawli kajahri baʿḍikum libaʿḍin an taḥbaṭa aʿmālukum wa-antum lā tashʿurūna
inna alladhīna yaghuḍḍūna aṣwātahum ʿinda rasūli al-lahi ulāika alladhīna im'taḥana al-lahu qulūbahum lilttaqwā lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun ʿaẓīmun
inna alladhīna yunādūnaka min warāi al-ḥujurāti aktharuhum lā yaʿqilūna
walaw annahum ṣabarū ḥattā takhruja ilayhim lakāna khayran lahum wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū in jāakum fāsiqun binaba-in fatabayyanū an tuṣībū qawman bijahālatin fatuṣ'biḥū ʿalā mā faʿaltum nādimīna

wa-iʿ'lamū anna fīkum rasūla al-lahi law yuṭīʿukum fī kathīrin mina al-amri laʿanittum walākinna al-laha ḥabbaba ilaykumu al-īmāna wazayyanahu fī qulūbikum wakarraha ilaykumu al-kuf'ra wal-fusūqa wal-ʿiṣ'yāna ulāika humu al-rāshidūna
faḍlan mina al-lahi waniʿ'matan wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun

wa-in ṭāifatāni mina al-mu'minīna iq'tatalū fa-aṣliḥū baynahumā fa-in baghat iḥ'dāhumā ʿalā al-ukh'rā faqātilū allatī tabghī ḥattā tafīa ilā amri al-lahi fa-in fāat fa-aṣliḥū baynahumā bil-ʿadli wa-aqsiṭū inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-muq'siṭīna
innamā al-mu'minūna ikh'watun fa-aṣliḥū bayna akhawaykum wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā yaskhar qawmun min qawmin ʿasā an yakūnū khayran min'hum walā nisāon min nisāin ʿasā an yakunna khayran min'hunna walā talmizū anfusakum walā tanābazū bil-alqābi bi'sa al-s'mu al-fusūqu baʿda al-īmāni waman lam yatub fa-ulāika humu al-ẓālimūna

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ij'tanibū kathīran mina al-ẓani inna baʿḍa al-ẓani ith'mun walā tajassasū walā yaghtab baʿḍukum baʿḍan ayuḥibbu aḥadukum an yakula laḥma akhīhi maytan fakarih'tumūhu wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha tawwābun raḥīmun
yāayyuhā al-nāsu innā khalaqnākum min dhakarin wa-unthā wajaʿalnākum shuʿūban waqabāila litaʿārafū inna akramakum ʿinda al-lahi atqākum inna al-laha ʿalīmun khabīrun
qālati al-aʿrābu āmannā qul lam tu'minū walākin qūlū aslamnā walammā yadkhuli al-īmānu fī qulūbikum wa-in tuṭīʿū al-laha warasūlahu lā yalit'kum min aʿmālikum shayan inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
innamā al-mu'minūna alladhīna āmanū bil-lahi warasūlihi thumma lam yartābū wajāhadū bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim fī sabīli al-lahi ulāika humu al-ṣādiqūna
qul atuʿallimūna al-laha bidīnikum wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wal-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
yamunnūna ʿalayka an aslamū qul lā tamunnū ʿalayya is'lāmakum bali al-lahu yamunnu ʿalaykum an hadākum lil'īmāni in kuntum ṣādiqīna
inna al-laha yaʿlamu ghayba al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu baṣīrun bimā taʿmalūna
